title: Rainbow Connection
lyrics:
(A)Why are there (F#m)so many (D)songs about (E)rainbows
and (A)what's on the (F#m)other (D)side
(A)Rainbows are (F#m)visions but (D)only il(E)lusions
(A)Rainbows have (F#m)nothing to (D)hide
(D)So we've been told and some choose to believe it
(E7)I know the wrong way to (E)see
(D)Some day we'll (E)find it the (A)rainbow con(F#m)nection
The (D)lovers the (E)dreamers and (A)me
 
(A)Who said that (F#m)every wish will (D)be heard and (E)answered
and (A)wished on a (F#m)morning (D)star
(A)Somebody (F#m)thought of that and (D)someone be(E)lieved him
(A)Look what it's (F#m)done so (D)far
(D)What's so amazing and keeps us stargazing
(E7)What do we think we might (E)see
(D)Some day we'll (E)find it the (A)rainbow con(F#m)nection
The (D)lovers the (E)dreamers and (A)me
[bridge]
(G)All of us (D)under its (C)spell,
We (C)know that it's (Am)probably (D)ma(D#maj7)gic ............
 
(A)Have you been (F#m)half asleep and (D)have you heard (E)voices
(A)I've heard them (F#m)calling my (D)name
(A)Are these the (F#m)sweet sounds that (D)called the young (E)sailors
(A)I think that they're (F#m)one and the (D)same
(D)I've heard it too many times to ignore it
It's (E7)something that I'm supposed to (E)be
 
(D)Some day we'll (E)find it the (A)rainbow con(F#m)nection
The (D)lovers the (E)dreamers and (A)me
(D)Some day we'll (E)find it the (A)rainbow con(F#m)nection
The (D)lovers the (E)dreamers and (A)me (A-single strum) [end]
